SPECIFICATIONS

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

Dairy Farm Gift Vouchers

This voucher expires 12 months from the month of issue.

This voucher is valid only when duly stamped and signed by authorised signatory.

This voucher is valid only within Singapore and its value is equivalent to the Singapore currency as printed.

This voucher is not refundable and cannot be replaced if lost, damaged or expired.

This voucher is not refundable or exchangeable for cash and any unused balance will not be refunded. Shuga Pte Ltd is not affiliated with Dairy Farm. Terms and Conditions of Dairy Farm applies.
